title: Tunisia - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Tunisia stands at N/A with n/a outlook. Moody's credit rating for Tunisia was last set at Caa1 with under review outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Tunisia was last reported at CCC with n/a outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Tunisia thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Tunisia as reported by major credit rating agencies.
